gitCommit.subject: Fix visual regression test infrastructure comprehensively
gitCommit.body:
Fix visual regression test infrastructure comprehensively

Major fixes:
- Fix waitForAnimations timeout issues (cap at 3s, add error handling)
- Add missing data-testid attributes (waitlist-email-input, waitlist-submit-button)
- Create and integrate ScrollToTop component for scroll tests
- Improve setupPurchaseMode robustness with fallback selectors
- Optimize preparePageForScreenshot with Promise.allSettled
- Reduce timeout waits and improve error handling

Issues resolved:
- Visual test timeouts (45s â†’ 3s max)
- Missing scroll-to-top component
- Purchase mode setup failures
- Animation waiting indefinitely
- Missing waitlist form test IDs

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>

gitCommit.subject: Fix visual regression test infrastructure comprehensively
gitCommit.body:
Fix visual regression test infrastructure comprehensively

Major fixes:
- Fix waitForAnimations timeout issues (cap at 3s, add error handling)
- Add missing data-testid attributes (waitlist-email-input, waitlist-submit-button)
- Create and integrate ScrollToTop component for scroll tests
- Improve setupPurchaseMode robustness with fallback selectors
- Optimize preparePageForScreenshot with Promise.allSettled
- Reduce timeout waits and improve error handling

Issues resolved:
- Visual test timeouts (45s â†’ 3s max)
- Missing scroll-to-top component
- Purchase mode setup failures
- Animation waiting indefinitely
- Missing waitlist form test IDs
